docs.title: The Developers Friendly Open Source Workspace
Alpine on Windows built with Python
docs.text:
From a Windows terminal , run: 

curl.exe -LO $url https://github.com/kindos-forge/kindos/releases/latest/download/kindos.tar.gz
wsl.exe --import KindOS $Env:USERPROFILE\KindOS kindos.tar.gz

# Enter KindOS
wsl -d KindOS

docs.title: Code Of Conduct
docs.text:
Success

  • Kindness: Make the others feel good «with meaning»
  • Respect: To show admiration for someone «also following rules»

If you respect someone, you must be kind to them.

Warning

  • "Rules" are relative, you can fail to respect because of unknown rules
  • "Good" is relative, you can fail to be kind because of unknown meanings

After teaching your rules and your meanings, you should expect to receive respect and kindness. If you don't receive respect from someone reach a group admin, do not react back in the same way.

Failure

The perceived attempt to harm someone is not kind nor respectful and will NOT be allowed.

docs.title: Contact
docs.text:
• 🤝 Diversity Friendly Code of Conduct
  • 🔒 End to end encryption communication for maximum privacy

If you are interested in joining the community, please join the telegram group and introduce yourself.

docs.title: Contribute to this site
docs.text: You can edit and test this site using the following instructions on this page

docs.title: Requirements
docs.text: • Linux or Windows systems with Python installed.

docs.title: Run the site
docs.text:
git git@github.com:KindOS-Forge/kindos-forge.github.io.git
cd kindos-forge.github.io.git
pip install -r requirements.txt
mkdocs serve

Browse localhost .

Change the contents of the doc folder, the page will be automatically reloaded

docs.text:
This document is a list of the running costs for the infrastructure.

Service Cost Notes DNS $6.60/year Domain registration

docs.title: Privacy Policy
docs.text:
Requested or stored information?

We do not request, collect or transmit any additional information to 3rd parties.

  • If you use Telegram, check the [Telegram Privacy Policy].

Violation of privacy policy

  • If you do not agree with this privacy policy, please do not join any group.
  • If you notice a violation of this privacy policy, please create a github issue on this project.

docs.title: Security
docs.text: If you would like to report a security issue, please send a mail to lamego.pinto@gmail.com .
